content.raw: Also of note, the command genomedata-hard-mask does not support genomedata filename globs. This wouldn't be too difficult but it would require a somewhat significant amount of code (mostly trackname book keeping) and tests to cover the globbed genomedata names. I've omitted for now in favor of opening an issue unless there's feedback that it should be included in this PR specifically.
content.html: Also of note, the command genomedata-hard-mask does not support genomedata filename globs. This wouldn't be too difficult but it would require a somewhat significant amount of code (mostly trackname book keeping) and tests to cover the globbed genomedata names. I've omitted for now in favor of opening an issue unless there's feedback that it should be included in this PR specifically.
